pros: Great people, Great benefits and diversity.
cons: There may be alligators in the surrounding waters.

pros: During non-peak seasons, working remote once per week was a possibility.
cons: Sometimes will have long hours, so no overtime since you’re salary

pros: Many people are friendly and helpful. Great benefits.
cons: My Chair did everything he wanted. Rarely in the office, rarely answering emails, rarely answering the phone. If you had a problem with a student, he would blame you without listening to your version. I left San Jac because of the Chair. Students are also very rude, but very helped by the lazy Chair. My Chair did everything he could to impress the Dean while the Dean has no idea how poorly this Chair behaved in his Department.

review_title: Worked there for about 7 years as a tutor
pros: Nice environment with very friendly staff
cons: Staff parking gets full by mid day so finding a parking spot close is hard
